It will definitely take some time and practice to implement TS with little difficulty in my work,  but this course boosted my confidence in using TS :)

feedback: This course was very well put together and excellently presented in a competent and digestible mannor.
The variety of the curriculum and the easy to understand explanation by the lecturer

10 | 10 | 10 | 10 | The whole course was very clear and went through at a great pace that seemed to keep everyone at the relevant pace for themselves, which is something I've found is rare in these courses, so very impressed! | N/a
Depth & Breadth of content covered
Structured and easy to follow
The amount of topics covered, instructors patience with answering questions

Kevin was a brilliant instructor! He's super approachable and a fantastic teacher. I really liked how the teaching was broken up with regular tasks and that we had proper breaks, which weren't taken up with more teaching even though there was definitely more we could have covered. I think the firm breaks made the overall course much more effective than if Kevin had tried to cram everything in without stopping.
Good coverage of subject matter, plenty of help, lots of example
A lot of ground was covered in an interesting and informative way.

feedback: 8 | 5 | 10 | 7 | Time was used to answer any questions we had | slow it down or make the course longer

10 | 8 | 10 | 8 | Lots of examples, Kevin is enthusiastic about the subject, and was great at problem solving our issues! | possibly more short labs, however I understand that time would be an issue. | delivery was great, the github repo was well organised, and Kevin provided loads of great links for tools and future learning

10 | 9 | 10 | 10 | Instructor was brilliant and engaging. Content was great with a good balance of labs | If all the labs eventually built up to a single end goal/product that would feel really rewarding. i.e. a game | It worked really well, breakout rooms were helpful

10 | 7 | 10 | 8 | Covered a lot of material, Kevin was really approachable, helpful and funny - thank you so much for the patience with explaining the basics in the break out rooms! Content and structure of course was also good.

10 | 10 | 10 | 10 | The trainer, Kevin was excellent and very clear. He made very udnerstandable some Python concepts I hadd found abstruse before. | Can't think of anything. | Very well organised, with al lthe fiels, labs and solutions available for later review.

9 | 10 | 10 | 9 | Lots of practical examples and labs. Not putting pressure on attendees to complete tasks. | This course can have 2 variations maybe if enough resources. I can see some topics and aspects could be challenging for people who never code. | Excellent

10 | 7 | 10 | 10 | Despite being just 3 days I came away with a good overall knowledge of python and what it can do. The labs were structured well and organised and Kevin was a great instructor as always explained things in an easy way to follow. Was great. Good timings with breaks and lunch and never felt long or tiring like others can do

Kevin was very friendly and approachable. The course structure and day plans were clearly laid out. Kevin clearly enjoys teaching and communicating, his energy didn't flag even after 3 full days! Very competent and knowledgeable
The interactivity and great tutor. The delivery was great I found it worked really well being remote
I appreciated the course structure and how the content was delivered in a clear and organized manner
instructor was clear and broke things down in an understandable way

The instructor was brilliant and friendly, his approach to TDD felt more relevant to my day-to-day life than other explanations I'd seen before which I really appreciated. It's made TDD feel more practical and grounded for me. I appreciated that there was a range of activities including a chance to try things out myself. I also appreciated being put into small groups rather than pairs which made discussion easier. I also appreciate the further reading recommendations and lots of resources to refer back to.  I appreciated that the session was engaging and interactive without it feeling forced, with regular breaks.

Good mix of interactivity but also not too forced. Also liked that there were lots of alternative language examples available for the excercises. Delivery was good. Really liked the use of miro to deliver notes and combine interactivity, certainly more engaging than flat powerpoint slides. The task with the breakout rooms worked well too I felt.

I feel like nevermind the content, what I personally take away from a course can pass or fail depending on the instructors delivery and Kevin is just great. He's very engaging, clearly passionate about teaching and made it very fun. All good
information, explanation and how it is all relevant was delivered excellently. Epic, fun and engaging
A great revelation in terms of what we can do with TDD now. We can begin with the approach straight away which I wasn't sure of. Was a really good session.
I think it was really good, very intense but the teaching is amazing, Kevin is superb
